item.title: Convergence of AI and Traditional Product Management
item.description: The introduction of AI into products (and product management as a discipline) represents a transformative shift in how ed and evolved. products are developed, managed and evolved. AI is integrating into various stages of the product lifecycle and it not only accelerates the pace of innovation but also introduces new capabilities and challenges. The role of Product Manager must also evolve alongside the changes posed by AI to ensure that they understand the potential, limitations and risks of AI.
